description:
Even though all her friends are helping Lisa confess her feelings, Ōtani is so dense in that regard that he doesn`t get it.
Even worse, Ōtani doubles down on his cluelessness and asks her who she likes so he can help with the confession.
It`s Lisa`s birthday.
Ōtani asks Lisa to come to the station skyrise.
As his present, he secured two special seats just for them to watch the fireworks from there.
That kind gesture deepens her feelings for him even more, and Lisa blurts out her confession.
"...I... I love you Ōtani!"
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La scelta più importante! Una confessione d`amore
Otome no Ichidaikesshin! Lovelove Kokuhaku Daisakusen!!
Young Maiden`s Momentous Decision! Operation Love Confession!!
乙女の一大決心! ラブラブ告白大作戦!!
